sub_title: Co-director at International Child Development Initiatives (ICDI)
summary: My educational background is in cultural anthropology and I have worked as programme manager and researcher in non profit organizations, universities and public institutions in the Netherlands, Italy and  Belgium. My particular expertise is in project management, action research and training. My specific interests include: early childhood education and care, diversity and social inclusion, intergenerational learning, women's rights, intercultural dialogue, child and youth participation.
